title: The Home Garden
additional-note: While there are no renewals that specifically mention a contribution to a particular issue, some book renewals in the registered works database mention prior publication of some material in Home Garden, and may cover any such material published within 28 years of the renewal.  The earliest book renewal mentioning The Home Garden is the 1979 renewal for 'All About African Violets' by Montague Free, published in 1951.
